title: Charge (feat. Larry League)
lyrics:
Jewelry shine like knights in armor, we gon' charge (Yeah!)

When it come to working, we gon' charge (We gon' charge)
You got real low power need to charge (Charge, charge!)
Jewelry shine like knights in armor, we gon' charge (Charge, charge, charge!)
I just played that pussy boy like a guitar (Uhhey!)

When it come to working, we gon' charge (Charge!)

Aye, aye, aye

I be runnin' up the check, bitch you still at the start (Fuckin' tweaking)

And I keep that iron man, I'mma leave you Tony Stark (I'll leave you leakin')

I be pussy famished, I got that fam lit

Bitch, I be either leanin' or off a Xanax

I ain't got no fucking rhyme or reason, I fuckin' planned it (I fuckin' planned it)

Pussy mother fucker cappin' ain't on this planet (Take you off the planet)



Jewelry shine like knights in armor, we gon' charge (Yeah!)

When it come to working, we gon' charge (We gon' charge)

I just played that pussy boy like a guitar (Uhhey!)

When it come to working, we gon' charge (Charge!)

Gone in a minute, ain't no charge (No way!)



Yeah, Bans!

Look

I'm on house arrest so I be charged, Aye

Bitches basic can't [?], Aye

I'm so high that I feel like a martian

Geeked up, booted up, off them bars bitch, Aye

Look at how my chain swang, 1OF1 the gang gang

When I'm with my side bitch treat her like my main thang

I know you niggas pussy, know you sweet like some candy canes

I just left the show with his hoe, 'bout to run a train



Pants Dolce, but ain't shit sweet (Hell nah)

Larry get the okay, and he pull up with the treats (Good drugs)

Go and [?], but please don't speak (Nah)

The only sound I'm tryin' hear is when she on her knees (Suck it up)

And you know I got to charge, 'cause I can't do shit for free (Nah)

Runnin' up the check, collecting every fee (Count it up)

Heard some dirt I did, but you ain't heard of me (Uhhey!)

We got horses, we gon' charge, bitch this ain't no burglary



Jewelry shine like knights in armor, we gon' charge (Yeah!)

I just reached into the boat, that lick was large (Uhhey! Okay!)

When it come to working, we gon' charge (We gon' charge)

You got real low power need to charge (Charge, charge!)

I just played that pussy boy like a guitar (Uhhey!)

When it come to working, we gon' charge (Charge!)

Gone in a minute, ain't no charge (No way!)



God damn!

Turn that boy to nothin', he ain't nothin' but a waste (Pussy!)

Heat seekin', bitch I keep that heat up on my waist (Heat seekin')

Beatin' down doors, so I had to beat the case (Beat down!)

If it ain't blue faces then get the fuck up out my face (Hundreds!)

I'm with Yung Bans, countin' young bands

Dirty in my styrofoam, feel like dirty sand (Sippin' mud)

You do what you can, I do what I want

Pull up if you want the smoke, bet you fuckin' won't (Pew! pew! pew!)
